name: 中国共产党第一次全国代表大会会址纪念馆
name_en: Memorial for the Site of the First National Congress of the Communist Party of China
description: 中国共产党的诞生地，一幢典型的石库门建筑，见证了中国历史上开天辟地的大事变。
description_en: The birthplace of the Communist Party of China, a typical Shikumen building that witnessed a world-changing event in Chinese history.

name: 龙华烈士陵园
description: 一座集纪念、游览、文化、园林于一体的现代化陵园，安葬着众多为中国革命和建设事业英勇献身的烈士。
description_en: A modern cemetery that combines commemoration, tourism, culture, and gardens, where many martyrs who died heroically for the Chinese revolution and construction are buried.

name: 上海宋庆龄故居纪念馆
description: 宋庆龄长期居住和从事国务活动的地方，馆内保留了她生前的原貌，充满了浓厚的历史气息。
description_en: The place where Soong Ching-ling lived and engaged in state affairs for a long time. The museum preserves its original appearance during her lifetime and is full of rich historical atmosphere.
